briefTitle: Evaluation of Loteprednol Etabonate Versus Vehicle for the Treatment of Inflammation and Pain Following Cataract Surgery
officialTitle: A Randomized, Multicenter, Double-Masked, Parallel-Group Clinical Safety and Efficacy Evaluation of Loteprednol Etabonate, 0.5% Versus Vehicle for the Treatment of Inflammation and Pain Following Cataract Surgery
summary: This study is being conducted to compare the safety and efficacy of loteprednol etabonate to vehicle for the treatment of postoperative inflammation and pain following cataract surgery.
